text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ʙarpodorandai adolat ʙoşed [va] ʙaroi Alloh taolo şahodat dihed, agarci ʙa zijoni xudaton jo padaru modar va nazdikon [-i şumo] ʙoşad. Agar [jake az du tarafi da'vo] tavongar jo nijozmand ʙoşad, [ʙoz ham] Alloh taolo [az şumo] ʙa on du nafar sazovortar ast, pas, az havoi nafs pajravī nakuned, ki [az haq] munharif meşaved. Va agar zaʙonro ʙigardoned, [va haqro tahrif kuned] jo [az izhori on] xuddorī namoed, musallaman, Alloh taolo ʙa on ci ançom medihed, ogoh ast
